alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 4:18AM AKST until December 10 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 6 PM AKST SATURDAY FROM DILLINGHAM WEST... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 To 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...From Dillingham west. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 6 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to a half mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds near the coast will produce areas of blowing snow with visibilities down to a half mile from Dillingham and west towards Togiak. Snow is likely to continue into Sunday and perhaps Monday with more accumulating snow expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
